verses.text: Give ear \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* words, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, Consider \w my|strong="H1732"\w* meditation.

Hearken \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* cry, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* King, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*; \w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* thee \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* pray.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* morning shalt \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* \w hear|strong="H7181"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*; \w In|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* morning \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* order \add my prayer\add* \w unto|strong="H4428"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* keep watch.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w thou|strong="H8085"\w* \w art|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H8085"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* pleasure \w in|strong="H3068"\w* wickedness: Evil \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H8085"\w* sojourn \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w thee|strong="H8085"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* arrogant \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w stand|strong="H1481"\w* \w in|strong="H1481"\w* \w thy|strong="H7451"\w* sight: \w Thou|strong="H3588"\w* hatest all workers \w of|strong="H7451"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H7562"\w*.

Thou wilt \w destroy|strong="H3605"\w* \w them|strong="H8130"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* speak lies: \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* abhorreth \w the|strong="H3605"\w* blood-thirsty \w and|strong="H5869"\w* deceitful \w man|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1696"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w*, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* abundance \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* lovingkindness \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* come into \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* house: \w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* fear \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* worship \w toward|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* holy temple.

Lead \w me|strong="H1004"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w in|strong="H1004"\w* thy \w righteousness|strong="H2617"\w* \w because|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* mine enemies; Make thy way straight before \w my|strong="H7230"\w* face.

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H6440"\w* faithfulness \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6440"\w*; \w Their|strong="H3068"\w* inward part \w is|strong="H3068"\w* very wickedness; \w Their|strong="H3068"\w* throat \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H6440"\w* \w open|strong="H6440"\w* sepulchre; \w They|strong="H3068"\w* flatter \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* tongue.

Hold \w them|strong="H3588"\w* guilty, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God; Let \w them|strong="H3588"\w* fall \w by|strong="H3559"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* own counsels; Thrust \w them|strong="H3588"\w* \w out|strong="H2505"\w* \w in|strong="H7130"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* transgressions; \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* rebelled \w against|strong="H3956"\w* thee.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* let \w all|strong="H7230"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* take refuge \w in|strong="H5307"\w* thee rejoice, Let \w them|strong="H5307"\w* ever shout \w for|strong="H3588"\w* joy, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* defendest \w them|strong="H5307"\w*: Let \w them|strong="H5307"\w* \w also|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* love thy name \w be|strong="H3588"\w* joyful \w in|strong="H5307"\w* thee.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* thou wilt bless \w the|strong="H3605"\w* righteous; \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, thou wilt compass \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* favor \w as|strong="H3605"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* shield.
